title: FS: raw T206 commons under $20 each
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: raw T206 commons under $20 each
posts.post_content:
Simply add $2 to ship regardless of the number of cards.  Take all 25 for $325.  Scans can be found here:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/t206hound/raw-for-sale[/url]

AVAILABLE
John Anderson:PB - $19
Cy Barger:P350 - $12
Bunk Congalton:P350 - $14
Lou Criger:P150 - $15
Harry Lord:SC350-30 - $14
George Mullen:P350 - $13

Admiral Schlei (Batting):OM - $13
Jimmy Sheckard (Glove Showing):SC460-42 - $12
Bill Shipke:P150 - $15
Jake Stahl (No Glove Shows):SC150-30 - $18
Gabby Street (Portrait):P350 - $12
Jake Thielman:P350 - $15
Bob Unglaub:P350 - $16
Bob Unglaub:P350 - $16
Jimmy Williams:SC150-25 - $14

SALE PENDING
Beals Becker:SC350-25 - $12
Ed Killian (Pitching):P150 - $14
Ed Abbaticchio (Brown Sleeves):SC150-30 - $16
Lefty Leifield (Batting):SC350-30 - $12

Arlie Latham:P460-25 - $12

Hey Erick, sent you an email, interested in these two.  thanks!  Cliff
